subject: Soccer
Women's World Cup (Soccer)
organizations: United States Women's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: Two goals by Megan Rapinoe and several key saves by Solo, who has had trouble off the field, helped the Americans recover from a shaky start against Australia.
snippet: Two goals by Megan Rapinoe and several key saves by Solo, who has had trouble off the field, helped the Americans recover from a shaky start against Australia.
